data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Larsen, Kim, Bird, Graham, Ota, Mayumi (2013): The ANDEEP Tanaidacea (Crustacea: Peracarida) revisited I: the family Agathotanaidae Lang, with description of four new species. Zootaxa 3630 (3): 424-444, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3630.3.2
